rows.label: qev014001_MSG0001
rows.name: You made it, [ST:playername ]! That's great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0002
rows.name:
I don't know what I was going to do if you didn't
show. Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Anyway, we should hurry.
Eliza's about to give her big speech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0004
rows.name:
She's titled it "A City of Neighbors:
New LA's Inclusive Future."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_JNK0010
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev014001_SEL0011
rows.name: Show a minimal amount of interest.

rows.label: qev014001_JNK0020
rows.name: Engage

rows.label: qev014001_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Alice that Eliza's speech sounds fantastic.

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0005
rows.name: Aw, come on! Put some ENERGY into it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0006
rows.name: This is a chance to spread our message to the people![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0007
rows.name: RIGHT?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0008
rows.name: It was my idea! ...Eliza said it was brilliant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0009
rows.name:
And I know it'll work, because once Eliza gets going,
she's on fire![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0010
rows.name: Really, our whole operation's been burning up lately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0011
rows.name:
But speaking of fire, wouldn't it just be SO Alex to try 
and shut Eliza up? I'm honestly worried.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev014001_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Alice if she wants you to help out.

rows.label: qev014001_JNK0120
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev014001_SEL0121
rows.name: Jokingly ask Alice if she's worried about crazed fans.

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Yes, please! Oh, but be super careful, all right?
Don't shoot any innocent bystanders. Or Eliza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0013
rows.name:
Look, if you just keep a sharp eye out for bad guys,
I'm sure everything will be fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0014
rows.name: Um, sure? Hadn't really thought of that, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0015
rows.name:
But no! I mostly just need you to keep an eye out for
bad guys. If you see someone suspicious, stop 'em![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0016
rows.name:
Anyway, to sum up, your mission is to guard Eliza
during her speech. To guard her with your very LIFE!
...Um, please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0017
rows.name: Whew! Okay, now I can finally relax.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0018
rows.name: Honestly, Alice. You worry too much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0019
rows.name:
We're in New LA—BLADE's own backyard.
No one would be foolish enough to try something here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0020
rows.name:
The only thing to worry about is whether our message
will reach the people or not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0021
rows.name:
Aw, I'm not worried about that at all! Deep down,
I think we all want to know each other better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0022
rows.name:
And anybody who's still got reservations better
LOOK OUT, 'cause your speech is about to blow their
little xenophobic minds![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0023
rows.name: Right, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_JNK0210
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev014001_SEL0211
rows.name: Tell Alice she's right.

rows.label: qev014001_JNK0220
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev014001_SEL0221
rows.name: Say that minds can't be changed so easily.

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0024
rows.name:
Right! And look, I know we've seen some crazy times
since abandoning Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0025
rows.name:
but we've overcome them! We're adaptable creatures,
and it's our bonds with one another that keep us alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0026
rows.name:
Aw, boo! You don't REALLY think that, right?
I mean, sure, there are people like Alex around...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0027
rows.name:
but most of us humans are different.
We're peaceful and understanding and openhearted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0028
rows.name:
Thank you, Alice. And you as well,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0029
rows.name: I promise I won't let all your efforts go to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0030
rows.name: I'll make this speech a success, no mat—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0031
rows.name: ELIZA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0032
rows.name:
What the...?! No! She's been shot!
ELIZAAAAAA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0033
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0034
rows.name: Nnnn...aah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0035
rows.name: L-look! She's breathing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0036
rows.name: I'll get her to the maintenance center right away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0037
rows.name: But if we trace the path of the sniper's bullet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0038
rows.name:
I think they're in the administrative district.
You have to go find them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0039
rows.name: We HAVE to bring whoever did this to justice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0040
rows.name:
Go ask around—any little detail could be important.
Do whatever it takes to find that shooter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0041
rows.name: Eliza's in surgery at the maintenance center...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0042
rows.name:
She lost a lot of bioplasma, but...they say it's too soon
to tell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0043
rows.name:
Someone in the administrative district MUST have seen
the shooter though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0044
rows.name:
Any little detail could be important, so ask around and
find that gunman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0045
rows.name: Any luck finding the sniper?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0046
rows.name:
What? Someone carrying a rifle case boarded a Skell
and headed for Sylvalum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0047
rows.name:
So what are you standing here for?
Go get the shooter already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0048
rows.name: Someone will pay for hurting Eliza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0049
rows.name: Well? Did you find the shooter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0050
rows.name: WHAT?! He attacked you? And you beat him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0051
rows.name: ...I see. Thank you. I feel so much better hearing that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0052
rows.name: Eliza is... She's going to be in critical care for a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0053
rows.name:
Nothing life threatening, thankfully, but they need to
keep her under observation to make sure the new parts
don't cause any unexpected effects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_JNK0310
rows.name: Apologize

rows.label: qev014001_SEL0311
rows.name: Express your regrets for failing to keep Eliza safe.

rows.label: qev014001_JNK0320
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev014001_SEL0321
rows.name: Ask Alice how the movement can survive without Eliza.

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0054
rows.name: No one could have stopped that bullet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0055
rows.name:
And you caught the culprit, which earns you a gold
star in my book! ...No, really. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0056
rows.name:
Now it's my turn to step up and keep everything going
until she's back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0057
rows.name:
We aren't going to give up, that's for damn sure.
That's just what they want us to do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0058
rows.name:
It's up to me to keep things going until Eliza's ready to
take over again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0059
rows.name:
It's gonna be rough without her, but I'll happily take up
as much slack as I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0060
rows.name:
Hey, so listen. I can't prove anything yet, but I KNOW
Alex is the one behind this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0061
rows.name:
We can't let him win. We'll find a way to stop him
and make New LA a more peaceful city in the process![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0062
rows.name:
Oh, and Eliza gave me this to give to you before she...
Before. Anyway, here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0063
rows.name: There's so much work still left to be done...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014001_MSG0064
rows.name: I hope we can count on your help again in the future.[ST:wait ]
